heroDescription: Welcome to our official website! Invest in the future with XYZ - a revolutionary cryptocurrency.
whitepaperContent: Welcome to our White Paper. Here we discuss in detail the innovative solutions offered by our XYZ Token project, as well as our goals and vision for the future.
whitepaperContents: 1. Introduction: Why do we need XYZ Token?
2. Tokenomics: Economic model and distribution of tokens.
3. Technology: Main technical aspects of our project.
4. Team: Who is behind XYZ Token?
5. Roadmap: Plans for the near future.
